column3: Nit, there are only 2 error messages with periods, this one and:\nhttps://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/2c83c511dcda98550b660f6b62da7fab8548ca5c/src/wallet/feebumper.cpp#L293\nHow about removing the period in the last one and here: `"New fee rate ... - the totalFee value should ... to add transaction"`
My suggestion included replacing the inner period with -
BTW, is there a reason to have these `Error: ` prefixes?
Good point. Seems to be used only in a few places. I am going to remove the `Error:` prefix in the 3 locations it's used.
:trollface:nit, follow format below (replace `!` by `:`), check others.
